name: radioactivity_concentration_of_240Am_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "Am" means the element "americium" and "240Am" is the isotope "americium-240" with a half-life of 2.12e+00 days.
